EmailTemplate.subject: BEST has a new job for you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Great News - Best has allocated a job to you. Please click the link below to access and review all the job details.
ACCEPT the job if you can complete it at the allocated date and time.
Or
REJECT the job. Once rejected you are required to select either: Reject - Not interested in job (we will reallocate to another tech) Reject - Not available date/time (we will contact you to reschedule)
